articles.author: Rhea Mogul,Vedika Sud
articles.title: India says border violations erode 'entire basis' of ties with China - CNN
articles.description: India's defense minister told his Chinese counterpart on Thursday that violations of their shared border erode the "entire basis" of relations between the two Asian neighbors.
articles.content:
Indias defense minister told his Chinese counterpart on Thursday that violations of their shared border erode the entire basis of relations between the two Asian neighbors.
